name: Type It!+
description:
This is an expanded version of my earlier game, Type It! There are a number of changes, most notably that you're typing full words instead of just letters, as well as some visual "enhancements".

From the start, choose how many letters you want to be in the words you're typing. You only type the verb, so if the text on the screen was "Play It", you would type the letters P-L-A-Y.

Controls:

MMute/Unmute (While not in play)ENTERStart game
3-7, AChoose game modeBBack to game mode selection

Known Issues:

If you change from the main menu to one of the game modes and back again and then launch fullscreen, it will not display correctly. To avoid this, if you want to use fullscreen, launch it when you start the game.
